alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Dodge; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:26AM CDT until July 24 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Dodge County in east central Nebraska... North central Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 325 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Dodge, or 16 miles southwest of West Point, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... North Bend and Morse Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
